title: Hungary Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Hungary increased to 136.20 percent in 2020 from 129.20 percent in 2019. Private Debt to GDP in Hungary averaged 131.28 percent from 1995 until 2020, reaching an all time high of 182.20 percent in 2009 and a record low of 85.90 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
